name: WORLD END ECONOMiCA Complete Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack for WORLD END ECONOMiCA, with compositions by Fuyu, Kishida, Saadai, and Szak. Also includes the opening songs, insert songs, and ending theme! The openings are performed by Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets, and the ending is performed by Kiyono. The soundtrack is available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

Spicy Tails is a development group lead by Isuna Hasekura, author of the popular "Spice and Wolf" series as well as the manga series "Billionaire Girl." The World End Economica series of visual novels were brought to the West via Kickstarter as a joint project between Spicy Tails and Sekai Project.

short_description: Complete soundtrack to all three episodes of WORLD END ECONOMiCA, featuring the vocal songs as well!
